Navbar.slogan: Detail oriented, fast learner and problem solver

Main.mainText: with over 2 years of React experience, I'm driven by digital culture and stay current with the latest tech trends. I thrive on blending code and creativity to craft innovative and impactful digital solutions.
Main.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the usage of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top right corner and see how the content changes.

About.title: Here is a little background
About.description:
I am an experienced and highly motivated Frontend Developer with over 2 years of hands-on experience across a range of projects, including freelance work, company projects, and personal endeavors. Although my specialization is focused on Frontend, I have the necessary knowledge to perform Backend tasks and some DevOps functions, which gives me a Fullstack perspective and a great learning capacity.

In the Projects section, you'll find a showcase of my work, including my latest project, @bcn, a project where I leveraged the latest features of React in Next.js, such as server components. The project was seamlessly integrated with Supabase, demonstrating my capacity to explore and apply cutting-edge technologies to create comprehensive solutions.

Currently, I'm learning Angular to expand my skills. This, along with my experience in React, broadens my capabilities and enriches my understanding of front-end development.
